Sentencas: In the current scenario of innovative energy systems, reversible solid oxide cells (r-SOCs) are widely recognized as promising devices, thanks to their high conversion efficiency in both power-to-fuel and fuel-to-power modes.
Titulo: Ru-doped lanthanum ferrite as a stable and versatile electrode for reversible symmetric solid oxide cells (r-SSOCs)

Sentencas: A crucial aspect for their scale-up is the development of multi-functional compounds that can work as either air or fuel electrodes.
Titulo: Ru-doped lanthanum ferrite as a stable and versatile electrode for reversible symmetric solid oxide cells (r-SSOCs)

Sentencas: The most reliable alternative to conventional materials for r-SOCs are perovskite oxides.
Titulo: Ru-doped lanthanum ferrite as a stable and versatile electrode for reversible symmetric solid oxide cells (r-SSOCs)

Sentencas: Sr -substituted lanthanum ferrites (LSF) show large mixed ionic and electronic conductivity (MIEC) and versatile catalytic activity upon B-site doping.
Titulo: Ru-doped lanthanum ferrite as a stable and versatile electrode for reversible symmetric solid oxide cells (r-SSOCs)

Sentencas: Nevertheless, their poor stability in highly reducing environments precludes their widespread application.
Titulo: Ru-doped lanthanum ferrite as a stable and versatile electrode for reversible symmetric solid oxide cells (r-SSOCs)

Sentencas: In this work, 5 mol% Ru-doped lanthanum ferrite La0.6Sr0.4Fe0.95Ru0.05O3-delta (LSFR05) is investigated as a multi-functional electrode for reversible and symmetric solid oxide cells (r-SSOCs).
Titulo: Ru-doped lanthanum ferrite as a stable and versatile electrode for reversible symmetric solid oxide cells (r-SSOCs)

Sentencas: Ru-doping promotes LSF stability, retaining a higher lattice oxygen content.
Titulo: Ru-doped lanthanum ferrite as a stable and versatile electrode for reversible symmetric solid oxide cells (r-SSOCs)

Sentencas: Upon reduction, LSFR05 exhibits exsolution of uniformly dispersed catalytically active Fe-Ru nanoparticles.
Titulo: Ru-doped lanthanum ferrite as a stable and versatile electrode for reversible symmetric solid oxide cells (r-SSOCs)

Sentencas: All-perovskite symmetric cells showed remarkably high power density as H2-SOFC at 850 degrees C (602 mW cm-2), while in CO2-SOEC mode a current density output of 1.39 A cm-2 at 1.5 V was obtained.
Titulo: Ru-doped lanthanum ferrite as a stable and versatile electrode for reversible symmetric solid oxide cells (r-SSOCs)

Sentencas: With a standard 70:30 CO2:CO gas composition, the cell showed a polarization resistance as low as 165 m omega cm2.
Titulo: Ru-doped lanthanum ferrite as a stable and versatile electrode for reversible symmetric solid oxide cells (r-SSOCs)

Sentencas: The complete SOFC-SOEC reversibility was suc-cessfully assessed for over 200 h.
Titulo: Ru-doped lanthanum ferrite as a stable and versatile electrode for reversible symmetric solid oxide cells (r-SSOCs)
